root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 8-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Treatment of missing values:

  • At country level:

Multivariate regression techniques are used to impute missing employment values at the country level.

For further information on the estimates, please refer to the the ILO modelled estimates methodological overview, available at https://www.ilo.org/ilostat-files/Documents/TEM.pdf

  • At regional and global levels:
